reviews.sentence: Very enjoyable stay excellent value. The staff was very professional and helpful. Great swimming pool facilities. Big flat screen TV. Superior dining across the street for warm breakfast and lunch Ricks Resturant.

Ivy Rooms. The staff was very nice and the rooms were very clean. The hotel could use some upgrades in the bathrooms and closet space and overall rooms. was very clean and close to restaurants and shops. Lots to do near by. Great location. The rooms could use some upgrades with a more modern flare.

Nice until came out of Aldies super market to find a tired local who had dented our rental car then laughed at me and mocked me for calling the police on hima local to have a report made by mestupid tourist. The police officer would only do an exchange of information report since it was private property and was unable to assist more. The Aviation museum and it is staff were stupendous. Cheers.

Received value for my dollar. Room clean no issues. Pool area clean. Front Desk extremely helpful. Breakfast was a BYes I had go back again. Staff went out of their way for our needs. Pool Towels were given at front desk. Paid 1250 nite. Was there 31717 weekend.
Fair. Staff was really friendly and made up for a lot. The pool was good. The rooms very dates and not that clean. I would have expected more for the money we paid.

Okay. Staff was very helpful securing me a room with beds with memory foam toppers. Maids were fabulous and very responsive. Room was clean. Person on staff Friday morning the 6th was wonderful. Tried to make sure I had a good room. First room smelled like a bottle of bleach had been poured on the floor I could n’t breathe. Second room was fine. Pool area has terrible lounge chairs no pads. Old iron chairs. Some pads but worn out and dirty. With a little TLC this place would be ok. Mattresses are rock hard — they just put memory foam on them —. doesn’t help that much. It would really increase business to have decent mattresses. This place could be so much better for very little investment. Breakfast was ok the staff worked hard to keep food supplied. Rock hard pillows. Definitely wouldNEVER stay here again.

Needs an update. Staff helped us relocate to a better room. Rooms with balcony are much nicer inside. The heater in the pool was on during hot weather resulting in spa temperature giant pool. The other pool was not heated at all and too cold. They could benefit from better regulation of their pool temperatures.

Birthday weekend. We really enjoyed our visit to Palm Springs. Another thing that made it more memorable was our stay at the Ivy Palm Resort. It is so near the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway very close 15 miles to Downtown Palm Springs and about 15 20 mins drive to Desert Premium Outlet in Cabazon. The front desk and housekeeping staff were so nice to us. They got this awesome gamerom with different colors painted on the wall that my kids and I found so amazing and worth every selfie not to mention the ring light in the corner of the room where it serves as a photo booth area. They got heated pools too. We also enjoyed The breakfast a lot. All in all 55. No complaints at all. And I will definitely stay here when I am gon na visit Palm Springs again.

Amazing trip. The staff at The Ivy Palm made our trip that much more memorable. The staff was amazing. Very friendly and helpful. We were unable to make our first night of our reservation due to flight delays from the weather Minnesota problems. I called to tell them we would be missing our first night with no expectation of receiving a refund for the first night. The man I spoke to on the phone Daniel was so sweet and took the charge for the first night off. Most hotels would not do this. I was very impressed and highly recomendBreakfast was complimentary but could have been better.

Worse experience ever. I probably do n’t have enough space to write about this place. Perhaps one word can sum it up. horrid. I am still appalled about the conditions of this hotel. First of I want to say that the staff are helpful Ramon was very helpful and genuinely did his best to give the best possible service. But I can not say the same about the facility. The keys to my room did n’t work and my girlfriend had to wait while I walked back TWICE to the office to get a set of new keys while only one key worked and the other one was useless. The pool was shutdown by City if Riverside due to unsanitary conditions. The room my girlfriend and I were placed in were in a rundown building which seemed was not part of the hotel but a separate building with a swarm of bees adjacent to our room and pigeons looking for a cool spot away from the sunlight while flying over our heads every time we came out of the room. Stay away. Unles you like unpleasant surprises.

17degre and no pool services. In the middle of summer and with extreme temperature it was heartfelt to realize this hotels pool services were not in working order. To add to that their ice machines were not working as well. Need I say anything more.

Traveling alone as a woman I really appreciated how efficiently the front desk took care of a loud drinkin cusin group of construction guys hanging outside my door at night and quickly got them to move it indoors and keep it down. I had asked them myself and was met with drunken hostility. So it made me feel safe again so thank you to the staff. Visually a very pretty property tropical pool areas have an oasis look and feel. 2 pools 1 heated and 1 spa. Water looks beautiful. I did nt go swimming because although the pool areas are beautiful all the rooms look at the pool area. But if you are numb to the feeling that someone or everyone is watching you you are golden. People who did swim were in the pool for hours purring every so often so it must feel as nice as it looks. Nice breakfast buffet great staff friendly efficient.
Bad hotel Palm springs CA Ivy Palms Resort. Very horrible service rude staff dirty swimming pool and all around F rating.
They need to do major renovations for a better service.

The pool was not heated as they claimed it was. There was obviously no landscape maintenance. We had mold in the corners of the bathroom. Some staff members were rude. Others were exceptional. A real mixed bag.

My check in was fairly smooth. The room smelled weird it had stain on the carpet stains on the wall the sink water was white and the toilet would not flush. The pillows and bed sheets had stains that appeared to be blood stains. And when i asked for clean wash cloths they brought me some that were dirtier than the ones I originally had. I found a receipt on the floor with the date of 10219 they must not properly clean the rooms. I cut myself in the shower and when I asked the front desk for a band aide they said that they did not provide that for their guest. Over all I had the worst experience ever. I feel cheated robbed and disgusted.

I m 58 F traveling alone I really appreciated when the front desk efficiently moved away a loud drinkin group of guys hanging right outside my door one night after i had asked them and was met with hostility. Thank you front desk. Was an isolated incident stayed for 5 nights very peaceful property. And very pretty tropical pool oasis. 2 pools 1 heated and 1 spa. Water looks heavenly people who swam were in the pool for hours so it must feel as nice as it looks. Nice breakfast buffet great staff friendly efficient.

Good value hotel for hiking summit. Large room and good location to the Tram up to San Jac. Could have used a basic coffee pot in room. Both chairs have crotch spots n need cleaning. Lacks electric sockets by bed and desk. Shower n bath nice n hot. Bed good n comfortable. Walls a bit thin n some clients really inconsiderate slamming doors into the night. But good value for my use.
dated motel needs upgrading and deferred maintenanceck in staff was helpfulice machine not working.
The property is run down carpets old beds it should be replaced but the staff was friendly and it was clean.
